properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

identities.description: list of User assigned managed identities used by application

deployedPlatform.description: Platform on which application will be deployed

profileId.description: Chaos Studio profile id of an application resource.

faultMetadata.description: List of fault metadata of an application resource

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

applicationProperties.description: The properties of an application resource

applicationListResult.description: Model that represents a list of Application resources and a link for pagination.

nextLink.description: URL to retrieve the next page of Application resources.

urgent.description: If true, the notification is urgent.

NotificationDetails.description: The details of a user notification.

resourceId.description: ARM id of the platform resource on which application is deployed

platformProperties.description: Platform on which application is/will be deployed

containingFunction.description: Containing function which includes the call to faultable function

faultableFunction.description: function in which fault is injected

source.description: defines the location of the code in the class

clientId.description: client id of the managed identity

tenantId.description: active directory tenant id in which managed identity is provisioned

type.description: type of managed identity i.e AzureManagedIdentity

UserAssignedManagedIdentityProperties.description: User assigned managed identity assigned to the platform on which application is deployed

signature.description: Method signature of the containing function

containingFunctionProperties.description: Defines the signature of the function calling the faultable function

signature.description: Method Signature of the faultable function

category.description: SDK or Custom library in which fault is injected

faultCapabilities.description: faults supported by torch for the function

faultableFunctionProperties.description: Application function in which fault can be injected

parameters.description: Input Parameters supported by a fault

codePath.description: code path where function is defined

startLine.description: line in the code where function starts

startColumn.description: column in the code where function starts

endLine.description: line in the code where function ends

endColumn.description: column in the code where function ends

sourceProperties.description: defines the function code path and location in the class

functionNamespace.description: Namespace in which the function is defined

type.description: ClassName in which the function is defined

genericTypes.description: Types defined if Class is a generic class

genericCount.description: Number of types defined in a generic

arguments.description: List of arguments of a function

name.description: name of an archive which defines the function

publicKeyToken.description: public key token of an archive

type.description: defines the type of an archive

signatureProperties.description: Defines the attributes of the function signature.
